entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
